Company Name â€“ City , State
Traveled with a subject matter experts in Outside Plant Engineering to be trained as a knowledgeable fielder.

sections.summary:
Motivated, reliable and well-organized background in Telecom Outside Plant for 10 years' experience in field work, drafting, and sales accounts
managing looking for a position to combine my knowledge as a Sales Account Manager in Telecom.
Highlights
Telecommunications field measuring equipment
AutoCad, Progress
Cad, Quality
Creative analytical person Cold Calling, Safety
Persuasive negotiator Contracts, Sales
Energetic and driven with positive outlook Clientele, Telecom
Decision-making ability Client, Telecommunication
Excellent work ethic Clients, Telecommunications
Highly organized and efficient Customer service, Telephone
Adaptive learner Customer service specialist
Service-oriented collaborator Decision-making
Excellent planner and coordinator Designing
Adherence to high customer service standards Drafting
Customer service specialist Engineer
Customer service award Logistics
Excellent ability to sale Notes
Excellent memory Memory
Sales and Accounts Management Outlook
Cold Calling MicroStation

Organizational
